# IPO Allotment Calculator Project

This is a React TypeScript web application for calculating IPO (Initial Public Offering) allotment probability.

## Project Context
- **Framework**: React 18 with TypeScript
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **Styling**: CSS with responsive design and dark/light mode support
- **Purpose**: Calculate probability of getting shares allocated in an IPO based on user inputs

## Key Features
- Input form for application amount, lot size, share price, oversubscription ratio
- Investor category selection (Retail, HNI, Institutional)
- Real-time calculation of allotment probability
- Responsive design with modern UI
- Dark/light mode support

## Code Style Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow React functional component patterns with hooks
- Use CSS modules or styled components for styling
- Implement responsive design patterns
- Include proper error handling and validation
- Add meaningful comments for complex calculations

## Business Logic
- IPO allotment calculations are based on historical patterns
- Different probability calculations for different investor categories
- Consider oversubscription ratio impact on allotment chances
- Include disclaimers about estimation accuracy
